item.title: 1 Simple Change Makes Every Gathering More Meaningful, According to a Communication Expert
item.description: “The experience becomes richer,” says Patricia Fripp, communications coach to major companies.

item.title: New Study Highlights 3 Things Leaders Must Do Differently in 2026 to Reduce Burnout and Boost Well-Being
item.description: Seventy-nine percent of employees report experiencing burnout, and burned-out employees are 35 percent more likely to job hunt.

item.title: Investment in AI Peaked in 2025. They Just Won’t Admit It
item.description: Let’s read between the lines to figure out where that tech money is going next.

item.title: Match Your Mood: Oura Ring’s Color Update Is a Game-Changer
item.description: A new type of finish has allowed Oura to unlock a range of new colors. But what will they cost?

item.title: Pink and Yellow Font Theory Is Blowing Up—What it Really Means
item.description: Colors are not just colors anymore, at least according to TikTok users. Here’s what it means if you run into yellow font online.
